author: mattmann
msg: - updates to LuceneCatalog to not escape values for queries (since we are building the Query expression programmatically, this isn't necessary)

author: mattmann
msg: - make CatalogSearch accept a single "--url" parameter to specify the host and port location for the file manager service provider

author: mattmann
msg: - fix hard coded host name: there may be a chance that someone wants to access the file manager on a host other than clasp: localhost could have made some sense, but in the end it's nicer to have this as a parameter

author: mattmann
msg: - update to handle new Lucene 2.0.0 api (query is now a private field, so have to call the accessor)
